title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
description: JavaScript closures are a fundamental concept in the language. A closure is a function that remembers its lexical scope even when the function is executed outside that lexical scope.

title: A Guide to Responsive Web Design
description: Responsive web design is essential in today's multi-device world. It ensures that your website looks good on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.

title: Introduction to React Hooks
description: React Hooks provide a new way to work with state and lifecycle methods in functional components. This guide covers useState and useEffect, the most commonly used hooks.

title: Mastering CSS Grid Layout
description: CSS Grid Layout is a powerful tool for creating complex, responsive layouts with minimal code. This tutorial covers the basics of grid containers and grid items.
